wheelUnlimited.subtitle: DIMENSIONS. FIT & STYLE
wheelUnlimited.mainTitle: THE NEW WORLD OF WHEELS IS
wheelUnlimited.description: BBS Unlimited enables limitless customization of wheels - from colors to details - in the highest quality.

unlimited.title: UNLIMITED SYSTEM
unlimited.subtitle: BBS Unlimited combines technical precision and individual design in a unique wheel system. Thanks to modular components, the wheels fit almost any vehicle and can be freely configured in terms of design, style and details.

dimensions.subtitle: UNLIMITED
dimensions.title: DIMENSIONS
dimensions.description: Numerous wheel dimensions, wheel widths and concavities can be individually combined for front and rear axles.

fit.subtitle: UNLIMITED
fit.title: FIT
fit.description: An unprecedented variety of applications and combinations with just a few components and flexible adjustment of the offset.

style.subtitle: UNLIMITED
style.title: STYLE
style.description: Countless options for customizing the wheels. Wheel color, hub caps, rim protectors, wheel bolts and valve caps. Make a wheel your wheel.

adaptability.subtitle: ONCE PURCHASED
adaptability.title: FOREVER ADAPTABLE
adaptability.description1: Thanks to the Unlimited mounting system, your wheel not only fits one model, but almost any vehicle with 5-hole mounting.
adaptability.description2: With interchangeable centering rings and adapter discs, you can mount your BBS Unlimited wheel set on your next vehicle.

details.subtitle: IT'S IN THE DETAILS
details.title: EXCHANGE STYLE COMPONENTS
details.description1: Just like the wheel itself, you can also adapt the style components to different vehicles.
details.description2: Rim protectors, hub caps, valve caps and wheel bolts can be ordered individually in different colors.

unlimited.ctaButton: ALL DETAILS ABOUT THE UNLIMITED SYSTEM

hero.title: LET THEM TWIST THEIR HEADS
hero.subtitle: Customization options for a wheel that attracts attention
hero.alt: BBS BMW M3 CSL with custom wheels

inspiration.subtitle: LOOKING FOR INSPIRATION?
inspiration.title: CUSTOMIZATION OPTIONS FOR A WHEEL THAT ATTRACTS ATTENTION

image.alt: BBS CH-R II Standard Satin Black Wheel

unlimited.description: Infinite possibilities. Your style, your wheel.

image.alt: BBS CH-R II Unlimited Gold Wheel

standard.details:
5-hole bolt pattern – fixed
2 rim offsets – fixed
Aluminum centering rings

unlimited.details:
12 adjustable bolt patterns
10 adjustable rim offsets
Composite centering rings

standard.details:
Permanently defined
3 wheel colors
Center caps - pre-defined
Rim protectors - pre-defined
Wheel bolts - pre-defined
Valve caps - pre-defined

unlimited.details:
Freely configurable
80 wheel colors
24 center caps
6 rim protectors
5 wheel bolt versions
8 valve caps

styleComponents.title: STYLE COMPONENTS - CUSTOMIZE YOUR UNLIMITED WHEEL
styleComponents.subtitle: BBS UNLIMITED ACCESSORIES CAN BE RETROFITTED OR CONVERTED AT ANY TIME

descriptions.centerCaps: With a wide range of color and logo combinations, BBS center caps offer maximum customization for any wheel. From classic 2D designs to exclusive rotating caps with 3D logos - there's a perfect match for every style. This makes every BBS wheel a true one-of-a-kind.
descriptions.rimProtector: Our rim protectors protect your BBS wheels from contact with curbs and other damage. Choose rim protectors in your favorite color for the perfect look of your individual BBS wheel.
descriptions.wheelBolts: High-quality wheel bolts ensure secure mounting of your BBS wheels. Available in various colors and finishes to match your wheel design perfectly.
descriptions.valveCaps: Premium valve caps complete the look of your BBS wheels. Available in multiple colors and materials for the perfect finishing touch.

flexibleStyling.title: Flexible Styling
flexibleStyling.subtitle: Customize your wheels at any time

features.unlimitedSystem: Unlimited System - Suitable for almost every vehicle with a 5-hole bolt pattern.
features.variations: 345,600 possible variations. Design your own unique wheel by choosing from a variety of colors for the wheel, center caps, rim protector, wheel bolts, and valve caps.
features.standardVersions: Additionally, there are three permanently defined standard versions.
